statements: UPDATE book_reviews SET review_text='Great book, highly recommended.', rating=4.5 WHERE review_id=1;

UPDATE book_reviews SET review_text='Great book, highly recommend!' WHERE review_id=1;
UPDATE book_reviews SET rating=4.5, review_text='The plot was intriguing and the characters were well-developed.' WHERE book_id=5 AND user_id=3;
